name: places/ChIJB1MqQpxYwokRb9eR1AcS48s
formattedAddress: 315 Central Park W #1200, New York, NY 10025, USA
adrFormatAddress: 315 Central Park W #1200, New York, NY 10025, USA

originalText.text:
We rented office space here for 10 years for a medical office for 4 doctors and we never had a bad incident.
We found the staff to be attentive and quick to respond to all our needs. Whenever we needed help, there was always someone available. The super and the porter always helped us, without our asking, if they were around when we were tossing out our garbage for example.
If we needed to speak to the manager, again, quick response and not just by phone. Sometimes he got our phone message and would just come by to help.
The only reason we left our beautiful office space was because the doctor decided to retire when our last lease was up for renewal.
We all miss the office space and the people, from the porter to the concierge to the office staff.

originalText.text: The Crookford, owned by the Haberman family, is a prime example of how poorly managed and ill maintained an owner-occupied building can be.  Hot water is often out of service, elevators locked and the laundry room in this "luxury" building amounts to two washing machines for the 40+ units in the building.  Evidently, there are times when location is NOT everything.  We stayed here when my husband was first transferred to New York but we soon found another place to live in the neighborhood that was of much better value, hands down.

originalText.text: Wonderful location, gentle staff, charming apartment!
